org.powermock.modules.junit4.legacy.internal.impl
Class PowerMockJUnit4LegacyRunnerDelegateImpl

java.lang.Object
  TestClassRunner
      org.powermock.modules.junit4.legacy.internal.impl.PowerMockJUnit4LegacyRunnerDelegateImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PowerMockJUnitRunnerDelegate
public class PowerMockJUnit4LegacyRunnerDelegateImpl
extends TestClassRunner
implements PowerMockJUnitRunnerDelegate

A JUnit4 legacy (i.e. v4.0-4.3) test runner that only runs a specified set of test methods in a test class.

Most parts of this class is essentially a rip off from TestClassRunner used in JUnit 4.3.

See Also:
TestClassRunner
